entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
